name: qsv
description: Blazingly fast Data Wrangling Toolkit for Tabular Data
long_description: Comprehensive data-wrangling toolkit for transforming, analyzing, querying & validating tabular data. Process local CSV, TSV, SSV, Excel/ODS, and JSONL files w/o uploading. Despite the warning, only accesses APPROVED DIRECTORIES on your computer.

qsv_path.title: qsv Binary Path
qsv_path.description: Full path to qsv executable. Leave empty to auto-detect from PATH, or click 'Browse' to specify (usually /usr/local/bin/qsv or /opt/homebrew/bin/qsv on macOS). Install from: https://github.com/dathere/qsv#installation

working_dir.title: Default Working Directory
working_dir.description: Directory where qsv commands run by default. Defaults to Downloads folder. Click 'Browse' to change. Extension only accesses files within this directory and allowed directories below.

allowed_dirs.title: Allowed Directories
allowed_dirs.description: Additional directories where qsv can access files. Extension access is restricted to working directory and these directories only.

timeout_ms.title: Command Timeout (milliseconds)
timeout_ms.description: Maximum time to wait for qsv commands to complete

max_output_size.title: Max Output Size (bytes)
max_output_size.description: Maximum size of command output. Large results are automatically saved to disk.

auto_regenerate_skills.title: Auto-Regenerate Skills
auto_regenerate_skills.description: Automatically regenerate skills when qsv version changes (requires qsv repository)

check_updates.title: Check for qsv Updates
check_updates.description: Check for new qsv releases on startup

max_examples.title: Max Examples in Tool Descriptions
max_examples.description: Number of usage examples shown in tool descriptions. More examples = better understanding but higher token usage. Set to 0 to disable.

tools.name: qsv_config
tools.description: Display current qsv configuration (binary path, version, directories)

tools.name: qsv_select
tools.description: Select, reorder, or exclude columns from CSV data

tools.name: qsv_stats
tools.description: Calculate statistics (sum, min, max, mean, etc.) for CSV columns

tools.name: qsv_search
tools.description: Filter CSV rows using regex patterns

tools.name: qsv_frequency
tools.description: Show frequency distribution of values in columns

prompts.name: qsv_census_integration
prompts.description: Guide for using Census MCP Server with qsv for US demographic enrichment
prompts.text: Show me how to use Census MCP Server with qsv to enrich data with US demographic information.

features: Process local files (CSV, Excel, JSONL) without uploading
